headline: Revvity to Hold Earnings Call on Monday, April 28, 2025
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., April 03, 2025--Revvity, Inc. (NYSE: RVTY), today announced that it will release its first quarter 2025 financial results prior to market open on Monday, April 28, 2025. The Company will host a conference call the same day at 8:00 a.m. ET to discuss these results. Prahlad Singh, president and chief executive officer, and Max Krakowiak, chief financial officer, will host the conference call.

headline: FDA approves Revvity’s Auto-Pure platform and tuberculosis test combo
summary: The World Health Organization recognises the test as the “only” enzyme-linked immunospot-based interferon-gamma release assay.
